23:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey 23:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Working on that 23:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Not able to find time :( 23:33 <kushalkhandelwal> Working on it 23:33 <kushalkhandelwal> One more week with time issues , after 21 going to other city where I would be living alone and have a peaceful time 23:33 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu, Tell me 23:34 <kushalkhandelwal> All the fields have to be replaced with 23:34 <kushalkhandelwal> 2 new fields ? 23:34 <kushalkhandelwal> or the user can input in one field only 23:34 <kushalkhandelwal> like 5' 2" 23:35 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh I sent PR for last issue 23:37 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok you merged that :) 23:40 <sdumitriu> They should be two fields 23:40 <sdumitriu> We've been thinking about one field 23:41 <sdumitriu> But whenever the user has to respect a format, there's an open door for many different bugs 23:41 <kushalkhandelwal> True 23:43 <kushalkhandelwal> So have to accommodate 2 fields
